sentences.english: And utter disregard for personal hygiene.
sentences.chinese: 不乾不淨，完全無視個人衛生。

sentences.english: He acted without reference to his superior.
A nonrepresentational style that emphasizes formal values over the representation of subject matter.
sentences.chinese: 強調形式至上，無視內容的一種非寫實主義繪畫作風。

sentences.english: Junho yelled at Jay and Junsu ignored Jay when he tried to explain.
sentences.chinese: 俊昊對宰範大喊大叫而且峻秀無視宰範的解釋。

sentences.english: In Cairo, thousands of demonstrators have ignored a curfew.
sentences.chinese: 在開羅，上千個遊行者無視宵禁的存在。

sentences.english: To them, she's providing cover for the world to neglect Africa.
sentences.chinese: 對他們來說，她正在給世界無視非洲打掩護。

sentences.english: Local police and officials often ignore or fail to investigate migrants' complaints effectively.
sentences.chinese: 當地警方和官員經常無視或未有效調查移徙者的申訴。

sentences.english: Some are lovers. Blind to the consequences of their actions.
sentences.chinese: 有些身爲情人，無視她們的行爲後果。

sentences.english: And we shouldn't ignore those similarities.
sentences.chinese: 而我們不應該無視這些共同性。

sentences.english: But, evidently, Blatter is oblivious to all that.
sentences.chinese: 但很顯然，布拉特無視了一切。

sentences.english: It’s going to be very difficult (to dislodge China).
sentences.chinese: 無視中國將是很困難的事情。

sentences.english: The desire to climb the mountain blinded Jim to all the difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 登山的強烈慾望使吉姆無視所有的困難。

sentences.english: Try to have some compassion for him, irritating little wanker that he is.
sentences.chinese: 同情他些，無視他是個小混蛋的那一點吧。

sentences.english: They flout the most basic laws protecting the rights of workers.
sentences.chinese: “他們公然無視保護勞工權利的最基本法規”。

sentences.english: Indeed, I had had no suspicions or fears that I had ignored.
sentences.chinese: 的確，我沒有產生過我無視的懷疑或恐懼。

definition: to erase/to cover traces/to obliterate evidence/to expunge/to blot out/to suppress
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
to despise/to disdain/to look down upon
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
